caption.p: a, b Total number of cases as a function of the number of days starting from 22-01-2020 for China ( a) and South Korea ( b). The fast-growing phase ( f), slow-growing phase ( s) and plateau phase ( p) are marked. These phases may be discerned from the apparent variations in the growth exponent. c, d Number of new cases as a function of the number of days starting from 22-01-2020 for China ( c) and South Korea ( d). Peak in the number of new cases is marked with asterisks. All data are collected until 20-05-2020
